overview:
Founded in 2010, Unite is a Los Angeles based ad tech company with offices in Montreal and Toronto. Our company develops applications for the AppNexus App Marketplace and operates as a Demand Side Platform.

We excel by providing advertising placement in content rich and brand safe environments. With a focus on developing product that increases consumer and brand engagement, our apps encourage consumers to interact with advertisers, leading to increased brand lift.

Consumer interaction, social advocacy and the unlocking of exclusive content is the next wave in brand engagement. The engagement medium is the most sought after form of communication for brand advertisers as it provides real‐time interaction with a captive audience.

Our fresh approach to brand advertising is coupled with new key performance indicators and brand centric analytics. Here at Unite, we provide measurable return on ad spend by brand advertisers’ standards.
